text: Approval for the zilver ptx drug-eluting peripheral stent. this device is indicated for improving luminal diameter for the treatment of de novo or restenotic symptomatic lesions in native vascular disease of the above-the-knee femoropopliteal arteries having reference vessel diameters from 4 mm to 9 mm and total lesion lengths up to 140 mm per limb and 280 mm per patient.
